trans-unit.source: Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure

trans-unit.source: Code Sample: ASP.NET MVC 4 with Federated Sign-out
trans-unit.target: Code Sample: ASP.NET MVC 4 with Federated Sign-out

trans-unit.source: This sample illustrates how to integrate <token>firstref_acs</token> with an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.
trans-unit.target: This sample illustrates how to integrate <token>firstref_acs</token> with an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.

trans-unit.source: ACS integration enables single sign-on and single sign-out features for supported identity providers in an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.
trans-unit.target: ACS integration enables single sign-on and single sign-out features for supported identity providers in an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.

trans-unit.source: The code for this sample is located in the <ui>ASPNETSimpleMVC4</ui> (C#\Websites\ASPNETSimpleMVC4) subdirectory of the <token>ad_acs_code_gallery</token> package.
trans-unit.target: The code for this sample is located in the <ui>ASPNETSimpleMVC4</ui> (C#\Websites\ASPNETSimpleMVC4) subdirectory of the <token>ad_acs_code_gallery</token> package.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the single sign-out feature in ACS, see <link xlink:href="c63a22d4-158b-4d8d-a957-edcd728f234b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Single sign-out</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about the single sign-out feature in ACS, see <link xlink:href="c63a22d4-158b-4d8d-a957-edcd728f234b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Single sign-out</link>.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: To run this sample, you will need:
trans-unit.target: To run this sample, you will need:

trans-unit.source: An account in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=275081</linkUri></externalLink> (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=275081) and an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.
trans-unit.target: An account in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=275081</linkUri></externalLink> (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=275081) and an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.

trans-unit.source: This sample uses an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> called acssamples.
trans-unit.target: This sample uses an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> called acssamples.

trans-unit.source: Your namespace name can be different.
trans-unit.target: Your namespace name can be different.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>, see <link xlink:href="dba0b42b-c631-4f60-bb3a-7b84d2ac406f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Create an Access Control Namespace</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about creating an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>, see <link xlink:href="dba0b42b-c631-4f60-bb3a-7b84d2ac406f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Create an Access Control Namespace</link>.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Identity and Access Tool for Visual Studio 2012</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh545418.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh545418.aspx)
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Identity and Access Tool for Visual Studio 2012</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh545418.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh545418.aspx)

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b52e98da-25cc-47d0-832f-a3ee58951524" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">ACS Prerequisites</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b52e98da-25cc-47d0-832f-a3ee58951524" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">ACS Prerequisites</link>.

trans-unit.source: Configuring the Sample
trans-unit.target: Configuring the Sample

trans-unit.source: You can use the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal or the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service to configure this sample.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal or the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service to configure this sample.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes both options.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes both options.

trans-unit.source: Option 1: Using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal
trans-unit.target: Option 1: Using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal

trans-unit.source: Option 2: Using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service
trans-unit.target: Option 2: Using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service

trans-unit.source: Option 1: Using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal
trans-unit.target: Option 1: Using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal

trans-unit.source: To configure the sample using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal
trans-unit.target: To configure the sample using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal

trans-unit.source: The <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal opens.
trans-unit.target: The <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal opens.

trans-unit.source: To allow users of your application to login with their <system>Google</system> or <system>Yahoo!</system> identities, click <ui>Identity providers</ui>, click <ui>Add</ui> and then add <ui>Google</ui> and <ui>Yahoo!</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To allow users of your application to login with their <system>Google</system> or <system>Yahoo!</system> identities, click <ui>Identity providers</ui>, click <ui>Add</ui> and then add <ui>Google</ui> and <ui>Yahoo!</ui>.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see <link xlink:href="b13d2d06-7d68-4c23-885a-302435830941" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Google as an ACS Identity Provider</link> and <link xlink:href="760a3923-2311-48ef-bc78-c32b4cd2f861" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Yahoo! as an ACS Identity Provider</link>. <token>ms_acct</token> is added by default and cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see <link xlink:href="b13d2d06-7d68-4c23-885a-302435830941" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Google as an ACS Identity Provider</link> and <link xlink:href="760a3923-2311-48ef-bc78-c32b4cd2f861" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Yahoo! as an ACS Identity Provider</link>. <token>ms_acct</token> is added by default and cannot be deleted.

trans-unit.source: To register your application with <token>secondref_acs</token>, click <ui>Relying party applications</ui>, click <ui>Add</ui>, enter the following information in the form, and then click <ui>Save</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To register your application with <token>secondref_acs</token>, click <ui>Relying party applications</ui>, click <ui>Add</ui>, enter the following information in the form, and then click <ui>Save</ui>.

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Name</ui> field, enter <ui>ASPNETMVC4Sample</ui>.
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Name</ui> field, enter <ui>ASPNETMVC4Sample</ui>.

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Realm</ui> field, enter <ui>http://localhost:65000/</ui>
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Realm</ui> field, enter <ui>http://localhost:65000/</ui>

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Return URL</ui> field, enter <ui>http://localhost:65000/</ui>
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Return URL</ui> field, enter <ui>http://localhost:65000/</ui>

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Error URL</ui> field, enter <ui>http://localhost:65000/Error</ui>
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Error URL</ui> field, enter <ui>http://localhost:65000/Error</ui>

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Token format</ui> field, select <ui>SAML 2.0</ui>.
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Token format</ui> field, select <ui>SAML 2.0</ui>.

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Token signing</ui> field, select <ui>Use service namespace certificate (standard)</ui>.
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Token signing</ui> field, select <ui>Use service namespace certificate (standard)</ui>.

trans-unit.source: For information about the fields and values on the Add Relying Party Application page, see <link xlink:href="16708a9e-e1f1-4ad5-bed2-a49ccabc42b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Relying Party Applications</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about the fields and values on the Add Relying Party Application page, see <link xlink:href="16708a9e-e1f1-4ad5-bed2-a49ccabc42b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Relying Party Applications</link>.

trans-unit.source: To create a rule group that sends all claims issued by the identity providers to the relying party application, click <ui>Rule groups</ui>, click <ui>Default Rule Group for ACS Simple MVC4 Sample</ui>, and click <ui>Generate</ui>, and then clidk <ui>Save</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To create a rule group that sends all claims issued by the identity providers to the relying party application, click <ui>Rule groups</ui>, click <ui>Default Rule Group for ACS Simple MVC4 Sample</ui>, and click <ui>Generate</ui>, and then clidk <ui>Save</ui>.

trans-unit.source: The Rule groups section of the <token>secondref_acs</token> portal create the rules that determine which claims <token>secondref_acs</token> sends to your application.
trans-unit.target: The Rule groups section of the <token>secondref_acs</token> portal create the rules that determine which claims <token>secondref_acs</token> sends to your application.

trans-unit.source: By selecting all generated rules, you configure <token>secondref_acs</token> to send pass all claims issued by the identity providers to the relying party application.
trans-unit.target: By selecting all generated rules, you configure <token>secondref_acs</token> to send pass all claims issued by the identity providers to the relying party application.

trans-unit.source: The sample is now configured and ready to run in <token>vs2012</token>.
trans-unit.target: The sample is now configured and ready to run in <token>vs2012</token>.

trans-unit.source: Option 2: Using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service
trans-unit.target: Option 2: Using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service

trans-unit.source: The <token>vs_current_short</token> sample solution has a console application called <ui>ConfigureSample</ui> that uses the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service and the common helpers defined in the Common class library.
trans-unit.target: The <token>vs_current_short</token> sample solution has a console application called <ui>ConfigureSample</ui> that uses the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service and the common helpers defined in the Common class library.

trans-unit.source: You can use this application to configure your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for use with this sample.
trans-unit.target: You can use this application to configure your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> for use with this sample.

trans-unit.source: To configure the sample using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service
trans-unit.target: To configure the sample using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service

trans-unit.source: To configure the sample, open <ui>SamplesConfiguration.cs</ui> (acs\Management\ManagementService\Common).
trans-unit.target: To configure the sample, open <ui>SamplesConfiguration.cs</ui> (acs\Management\ManagementService\Common).

trans-unit.source: Replace the placeholders in the <system>SamplesConfiguration</system> class in the Common class library with information about your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.
trans-unit.target: Replace the placeholders in the <system>SamplesConfiguration</system> class in the Common class library with information about your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.

trans-unit.source: You can find the information in the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: You can find the information in the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: To navigate to the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal: <token>ad_acs_portal</token> <token>ad_acs_manage_namespace</token>
trans-unit.target: To navigate to the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal: <token>ad_acs_portal</token> <token>ad_acs_manage_namespace</token>

trans-unit.source: <ui>ServiceNamespace</ui> - Enter the name of your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.
trans-unit.target: <ui>ServiceNamespace</ui> - Enter the name of your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.

trans-unit.source: <ui>ManagementServiceIdentityName</ui> - Enter the name of an <token>secondref_acs</token> management service account.
trans-unit.target: <ui>ManagementServiceIdentityName</ui> - Enter the name of an <token>secondref_acs</token> management service account.

trans-unit.source: The default is <system>ManagementClient</system>.
trans-unit.target: The default is <system>ManagementClient</system>.

trans-unit.source: To find the management service account name, in the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal, click <ui>Management service</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To find the management service account name, in the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal, click <ui>Management service</ui>.

trans-unit.source: The accounts are listed by name under <ui>Management Service Accounts</ui>.
trans-unit.target: The accounts are listed by name under <ui>Management Service Accounts</ui>.

trans-unit.source: <ui>ManagementServiceIdentityKey</ui> - Enter the password for the management service account.
trans-unit.target: <ui>ManagementServiceIdentityKey</ui> - Enter the password for the management service account.

trans-unit.source: To find the management service account password, in the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal, click <ui>Management service</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To find the management service account password, in the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal, click <ui>Management service</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Click the name of a management service account, and then, under <ui>Credentials</ui>, click <ui>Password</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Click the name of a management service account, and then, under <ui>Credentials</ui>, click <ui>Password</ui>.

trans-unit.source: The password appears in the <ui>Password</ui> field.
trans-unit.target: The password appears in the <ui>Password</ui> field.

trans-unit.source: To copy the password, click <ui>Show Password</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To copy the password, click <ui>Show Password</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Run the <ui>ConfigureSample</ui> application in <token>vs_current_short</token>.
trans-unit.target: Run the <ui>ConfigureSample</ui> application in <token>vs_current_short</token>.

trans-unit.source: The application uses the data in <system>SamplesConfiguration.cs</system> to configure <token>secondref_acs</token> to run the sample.
trans-unit.target: The application uses the data in <system>SamplesConfiguration.cs</system> to configure <token>secondref_acs</token> to run the sample.

trans-unit.source: Running the Sample
trans-unit.target: Running the Sample

trans-unit.source: To run the sample
trans-unit.target: To run the sample

trans-unit.source: Open the solution file for the sample, <ui>ASPNETSimpleMVC4.sln</ui> (C#\Websites\ASPNETSimpleMVC4\), in <token>vs2012</token>.
trans-unit.target: Open the solution file for the sample, <ui>ASPNETSimpleMVC4.sln</ui> (C#\Websites\ASPNETSimpleMVC4\), in <token>vs2012</token>.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the project and select <ui>Identity and Access</ui> from the context menu.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the project and select <ui>Identity and Access</ui> from the context menu.

trans-unit.source: Select <ui>Use the Azure Access Control Service</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Select <ui>Use the Azure Access Control Service</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Next to <ui>Select one or more providers ...</ui> click <ui>Configure</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Next to <ui>Select one or more providers ...</ui> click <ui>Configure</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Enter your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> and management service account password.
trans-unit.target: Enter your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token> and management service account password.

trans-unit.source: Select one or more identity providers from the list.
trans-unit.target: Select one or more identity providers from the list.

trans-unit.source: The identity providers that appear are those that you added when you configured the sample in the <token>secondref_acs</token> portal or the <token>secondref_acs</token> management service.
trans-unit.target: The identity providers that appear are those that you added when you configured the sample in the <token>secondref_acs</token> portal or the <token>secondref_acs</token> management service.

trans-unit.source: Your relying party application is now configured to use ACS.
trans-unit.target: Your relying party application is now configured to use ACS.

trans-unit.source: Press F5 to run the application.
trans-unit.target: Press F5 to run the application.

trans-unit.source: Your browser is directed to the <token>secondref_acs</token> Home Realm Discovery page.
trans-unit.target: Your browser is directed to the <token>secondref_acs</token> Home Realm Discovery page.

trans-unit.source: Click <ui>Google</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Click <ui>Google</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Your browser is redirected to a Google sign-in page.
trans-unit.target: Your browser is redirected to a Google sign-in page.

trans-unit.source: Enter the credentials of a Google account and decline the user consent form.
trans-unit.target: Enter the credentials of a Google account and decline the user consent form.

trans-unit.source: Your browser is redirected to <system>http://localhost:65000/</system>.
trans-unit.target: Your browser is redirected to <system>http://localhost:65000/</system>.

trans-unit.source: Notice that your Google username appears in the top left corner of the page.
trans-unit.target: Notice that your Google username appears in the top left corner of the page.

trans-unit.source: This indicates that you are signed into the relying party application.To sign-out of the relying party application, click the Sign-out link.
trans-unit.target: This indicates that you are signed into the relying party application.To sign-out of the relying party application, click the Sign-out link.

trans-unit.source: Notice that you are no longer authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Notice that you are no longer authenticated.
